About

Intro to R (Rfun) is from R We Having Fun Yet‽, or Rfun, a learning series hosted by the Center for Data & Visualization Sciences. At the main Rfun page we host learning modules with shareable code, video recordings of workshops, YouTube video modules, slide decks, and data sets. Our goals is for you to become more fluent in R as you analyze data.

A highlight of our introductory series are the Rfun quickStart materials you need to get started with data science and R. We offer a three-part introduction to R with shareable learning resources. Beyond getting started quickly, the next-level of materials and intermediate materials are then found at Rfun. You will also find links to additional resources like the Rfun YouTube channel and GitHub code.

Publishing Note

This website is produce in RStudio via R Markdown via the Quarto rendering engine. The files are version-controlled with git and pushed to a remote repository on GitHub. The GitHub repo is linked with Netlify so that each version is pushed to GitHub, them the website is automatically updated and served via Netlify.com.

https://Rfun.library.duke.edu https://library.duke.edu/data
